title: 3 Years After... Book 2. Mission: North Korea
description: Book 2 encompasses the next chapter for the team of the Seeker Element. They have been tasked by the remnants of the United States Government to go to North Korea on a harrowing mission to try to find the source of the deadly virus that started the end of days for Humanity. Follow the story of Achilles, Meat, Woody, Stewy, Opie, Big Brown, and Little Brown. Will they find a cure? Will their mission lead to their death?
author: G.R. Mountjoy
